csr.ML.LearnToRank module¶

class csr.ML.LearnToRank.BalancedFixedSizePairSelection(n_pairs_per_combination=10000)[source]¶

Bases: object

class csr.ML.LearnToRank.Pairwise(_classifier)[source]¶

Bases: sklearn.base.BaseEstimator

Learn-to-rank pair-wise metaclassifier Adapted from https://gist.github.com/fabianp/2020955 but uses dependency injection to allow using general classifiers adhering to the sklearn API. Requires a LINEAR classifier with coefficients stored in ‘coef_’.

Multiply that handles the sparse matrix case correctly. Because it is too much to expect multiplication to behave consistently in numpy and scipy…

csr.ML.models module¶

class csr.ML.models.DeepNetwork(layers, loss='binary_crossentropy', optimizer='rmsprop', input_type='text', shuffle=True, batch_size=32, class_weight=None, seq_length=100, embeddings=None, emb_size=None, emb_train=False, vocabulary=None, epochs=100)[source]¶

Bases: sklearn.base.BaseEstimator, sklearn.base.TransformerMixin

csr.ML.pipeline module¶

class csr.ML.pipeline.DenseTransformer[source]¶

Bases: sklearn.base.BaseEstimator, sklearn.base.TransformerMixin

fit(X, y, **fit_params)[source]¶
fit_transform(X, y=None, **fit_params)[source]¶

Fit to data, then transform it.

Fits transformer to X and y with optional parameters fit_params and returns a transformed version of X.

Parameters

  • X (numpy array of shape [n_samples, n_features]) – Training set.

  • y (numpy array of shape [n_samples]) – Target values.

Returns

X_new – Transformed array.

Return type

numpy array of shape [n_samples, n_features_new]

transform(X, y=None, **fit_params)[source]¶
